title: Mini Ham And Cheese Rolls
ingredients: ½ pound thinly sliced Swiss cheese
method: Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Step 2: In a small mixing bowl, combine onion flakes, mustard, poppy seeds and margarine.
Step 3: Split each dinner roll. Make a sandwich of the ham and cheese and the dinner rolls. Arrange the sandwiches on a baking sheet. Drizzle the poppy seed mixture over the sandwiches.
Step 4: Bake for 20 minutes, or until cheese has melted. Serve these sandwiches warm.
